About Eagle Care

Let us tell you a few things...

Eagle Care Transportation

Provides Special Transportation Service (STS) which is a transportation service provided to the elderly or disabled by an entity who receives financial assistance or grants from either the State of Minnesota or the federal government, or both.

Special Transportation Service providers play a critical role in the safe transportation of the elderly and disabled. MnDOTâ€™s role is to take action to ensure STS providers meet state and federal safety requirements, with the goal of making sure all passengers reach their destination safely.
